start.text: I have done it. I have become a Summoner.
start.speaker: Yuna

lulu_comment.text: Don't celebrate yet. This is only the beginning.
lulu_comment.speaker: Lulu

yuna_greet.text: Hello. I am Yuna. Wakka told me about you.
yuna_greet.speaker: Yuna

yuna_request.text: Will you guard me? On my pilgrimage to Zanarkand?
yuna_request.speaker: Yuna

choices.text: I'll do it. Maybe I can find a way home.
I'm not much of a fighter, but I'll try.

yuna_happy.text: Thank you! Let's go. Spira awaits.
yuna_happy.speaker: Yuna

yuna_encourage.text: We will help each other. I promise.
yuna_encourage.speaker: Yuna
